TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGraphicsContextInternal

Docs.summary: Provides methods to create new GraphicsContexts. Should only be used for extending OpenTK.

Docs.summary: Gets a handle to the OpenGL rendering context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance native int GetAddress(string function) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the OpenGL function (e.g. "glGetString")
Docs.summary: Gets the address of an OpenGL extension function.
Docs.returns: A pointer to the specified function or IntPtr.Zero if the function isn't available in the current opengl context.
